channel.title: Debian on { bit.therapy }
channel.description: Recent content in Debian on { bit.therapy }

item.title: Let's Let's Encrypt and get some free certificates
item.description: apt-get install letsencrypt -t jessie-backports certbot certonly --webroot -w /var/www/letsencrypt -d bittherapy.net -d www.bittherapy.net certbot renew --dry-run /etc/letsencrypt/live/bittherapy.net/fullchain.pem /etc/letsencrypt/live/bittherapy.net/privkey.pem ssl_certificate /etc/letsencrypt/live/bittherapy.net/fullchain.pem; ssl_certificate_key /etc/letsencrypt/live/bittherapy.net/privkey.pem; location ~ .well-known/acme-challenge/ { root /var/www/letsencrypt; default_type text/plain; }
